content.question: Stanâ€™s role in the passage is best described as that of

choices.label: a firm ally who offers Cynthia unwavering support
a disinterested outsider who is making polite conversation
a concerned third party who recognizes the complexities of the situation
a generic confidant who gives Cynthia an excuse to tell her story

content.answer: a concerned third party who recognizes the complexities of the situation

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain the function of contrasting characters.
